title: View Mode

View mode

search
A feature common to many databases is the ability to switch between View Mode and 
Edit Mode
. 
When a record is in View Mode, the fields are read-only. If the user has the appropriate permissions to edit the record, an Edit button will be visible at the top of the page.
See Also
 
Edit Mode
